price: 39. Ken nammay (qaranwaa kee baaxó kinnuk) ma-gininnino cakkil ken ginnem akke waytek, kinnih immay keenik (koros kinnuk) maggo mari woh mayaaxiga.
arabic: مَا خَلَقۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā khalaqnāhumā illā bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
